dlentry.dd: A collection of one or more software programs that have been converted into Docker containers.
A collection of one or more hosts, each with its own compute, network, and storage resources. The name of the default resource pool is default.
A host that runs the application services scheduled for the resource pool to which it belongs. A system may be configured as agent and master, or just agent, or just master.

The host that runs the application services scheduler, the Docker registry, the distributed file system, and other internal services, including the server for the browser interface. A system may be configured as agent and master, or just agent, or just master. Only one system in a cluster may be the master.
The collection of hosts in one or more resource pools.
